BiFold Leather Case adckckpro FREE GameFace With Visor Neo or Visor Deluxe Get a FREE GameFace with Zap when you purchase a Visor NeoTM or Visor Deluxe handheld from Handspringcom With a joystick and two firing buttons GameFace makes gaming fun and easy on your Visor handheld But this offer is only good for a limited timeso act now Find out more adckckgame Visor Prismnow only The amazingly to be seen Better yet take full advantage of VisorPhone now FREE with service activation and surf the web in full color from almost anywhere Get Visor Prism now adckckprism Special Offers Visit our Special Offers section to get the latest scoop on all the other incredible deals at Handspringcom adckckspec Treo Talk Welcome to Treo Talk a special section of the Handspring enewsletter devoted entirely to keeping you informed about our brand new product the TreoTM communicator During the next few weeks well bring you behindthescenes looks at its development stories from the Treo design team a sneak peak at some features and a whole lot more To learn more about Treo communicator go to adckcktreo The Road to Integration The concept isnt new If you carry around a mobile phone and an organizer youve probably wished someone would figure out how to combine them both into one small device Now imagine if you also had to carry around a pager or a messaging device Do this for a while and youll understand the benefit of putting all three into one package But successfully combining these devices involves much more than simply fitting them all into a single unit Sure you might get a good phone but probably at the expense of a decent organizer Thats because the individual needs of these devices are in constant conflict with each other A good mobile phone needs to be small but organizers and web browsers need to have reasonablysized screens to get the job done And a numeric keypad is great for dialing numbers but challenging for text entry No Room for Compromise These were some of the challenges the Treo design team faced when they started creating this product The team wanted a device that looked and felt comfortable as a phone but also worked perfectly as an organizer and wireless data device Other products that have existed in the past have been compromises explains Jeff Hawkins cofounder of Handspring and inventor of the PalmPilotR Youve had to trade off some of the main features to get the combined device Our goal with Treo was to find a nocompromise solution Powerful Possibilities The team began to consider everything that was possible in a combined phone and organizer that could not be achieved with standalone devices And what they found was often times surprisingly powerful The result is a device that actually improves upon each of its individual components through a variety of unique features The thing about Treo Hawkins says is that its small enough to be a phone and yet its improved upon the phone and its improved upon the organizer and its added wireless data capabilities that no phone or organizer has ever had And by combining them all together you basically have a smaller product that does more than either one does separately In the weeks to come well show you some of the unique features that resulted from this successful integration along with the thinking that went into them Youll get an indepth look at what happens when you take a phone an organizer and a messengeradd wireless Internet capabilitiesand successfully combine them into one powerful device that does it all Coming next week Why youll never have to dial a phone number again Tips Tricks You already know that To Do lets you keep track of those little tasks that call upon you each day But did you also know that you can add even greater detail or organize them into different categories If you didnt youre about to find out how Adding Details to To Dos Once youve created a To Do item you can still add more details if you need them Tap anywhere on the original To Do and then tap Details at the bottom of the screen to bring up the To Do Item Details From there you can enter its priority category see below and due date Then if you tap Note you can enter more details like driving directions and instructions If you liked this tip you can let us know by clicking below adckcktip Creating To Do Categories Always have a ton of tasks on your plate Keep your To Do items organized in separate categories To create a category tap the right corner pulldown menu and select Edit Categories Tap New and enter the name of the category work evening groceries etc Then when you create a new To Do item tap Details and select the category of your choice If you liked this tip you can let us know by clicking below adckcktip New Modules Soothe your worries away with a relaxing massage Raycom Personal Massager Relax your muscles anytime and anywhere Erase all those aches and pains that plague your muscles throughout the week Personal Massager stimulates your tired muscles and relaxes your body Just attach the two pads to your back arms or legs and let the massager melt your tension away Check it out adckckmassage Complete Module List For a complete updated list of Handspringcoms Springboard modules check out our Springboard Spotlight page adckckmod Write Stuff The holidays are just around the corner and toy stores around the country are gearing up Just ask Visor handheld owners Kevin and Cindy of Wisconsin Designing the Perfect Toy Store My wife and I both have Visor handhelds She has the basic and I have the Deluxe We both have the eyemodule and the VisorPhone My wife is an area manager for a large toy company She is based in Wisconsin and her territory includes Wisconsin Illinois and Minnesota She uses the eyemodule to immediately capture visual examples of how stores in her territory should be set up and sends them via the VisorPhone to her headquarters in live time For example her bosses were planning a presentation and asked that she take a picture of a merchandiser and send it The photo was taken in Illinois at about am and her corporate headquarters in Rhode Island had it by am When my wife had to be out of town on a business trip during our daughters graduation from fifth grade I was able to take pictures of our daughters graduation and email them to my wife within twenty minutes of the ceremony As you can see with the addition of the modules we have purchased our Visor handhelds have allowed us to better organize our busy lives Send Us Your Stories and Pictures If youd like to share a story of how you use your Visor handheld at work home or play send us an email at If you have a question relating to customer support try out our customer support link below esupportstarthsWelcomejsp International Subscribers Please note that all special offers presented in the enewsletter apply to the US and Canada only If you live in Europe and would like to subscribe to our European Handspring enewsletter go to
